mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource (name, type, category, url, status, file_size, file_type, uploader, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{category}, #{url}, #{status}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{uploader}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE resource SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, category = #{category}, url = #{url}, status = #{status}, file_size = #{fileSize}, file_type = #{fileType}, uploader = #{uploader}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE uploader = #{uploader} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, type, category, url, status, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, uploader, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM resource WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC
